content:
I'm glad I could help with the shedding tips!

And yes, I remember you mentioning the automated litter box earlier! It sounds like a fantastic investment, especially considering you got it at a great price! Automated litter boxes can be a huge convenience for pet owners, and they can also help reduce odors and messes.

I'm curious, how has Luna been adjusting to the new litter box? Has she taken to it easily, or was there a bit of a learning curve? And how has it impacted your daily routine?
